Package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service.fluent

Class RestServiceFluent

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentService
io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service.fluent.RestServiceFluent
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.base.ClassLevelHook, io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentChain
Direct Known Subclasses:
SuperRestServiceFluent
public class RestServiceFluent extends io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain.FluentService implements io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.base.ClassLevelHook
Provides fluent interactions for API requests and validations.

This class extends FluentService and enables streamlined API calls, authentication, validations, and retry mechanisms.

Author:

      Executes a retry mechanism until a specified condition is met.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type used in the retry condition function.
      Parameters:

      maxWait - The maximum duration to wait before giving up.
